content: >http://edition.cnn.com/2009/HEALTH/05/02/swine.flu/index.html?iref=mpstoryview An Alberta farmer, recently returned from a Mexican vacation, has passed the H1N1 virus to his pigs, a report to-day indicates. China reported it's first flu case to-day. A recently arrived Mexican vistor fallen ill in Hong Kong has resulted in the 7-day quarantine of a hotel. They must have been listening to Joe Biden for they've also quarantined all the passegers and crew on the airliners in which he travelled. >http://edition.cnn.com/2009/HEALTH/05/02/swine.flu/index.html?iref=mpstoryview
